alert.note: Alert for Southeast Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 18 at 9:52AM MST until December 18 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY BELOW 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Visibility below 1/2 mile in dense fog below 5000 feet. * WHERE...In Colorado, Four Corners along the San Juan River Valley. In Utah, Southeast Utah from the Four Corners along the San Juan River Valley to Bluff, and from Bluff southeast to Mexican Hat. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Major routes impacted include portions of Hwy 160 and Hwy 41 in extreme southwest Colorado as well as Hwy 162, Hwy 163 and portions of Hwy 191 in southeast Utah.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
